role.argrole: entity arg0 talks about in plain words

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 张))) (DNP (NP (NN 名片) (NN 大小)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN CPU))) (PU ，) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 说穿) (AS 了))) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 块))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 烧有) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 复杂)) (NP (NN 电路图))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 矽) (NN 晶板))))))
